thread.title: Alex Trebek Raps Kanye, Drake, Kendrick Lamar Lyrics on “Jeopardy!”: Watch
thread.title_full: Alex Trebek Raps Kanye, Drake, Kendrick Lamar Lyrics on “Jeopardy!”: Watch

author: Sheldon Pearce
title: Alex Trebek Raps Kanye, Drake, Kendrick Lamar Lyrics on “Jeopardy!”: Watch
text:
Alex Trebek Raps Kanye, Drake, Kendrick Lamar Lyrics on “Jeopardy!”: Watch Along with Lil Wayne’s “6 Foot 7 Foot” and Desiigner’s “Panda” Kanye (Michael Loccisano/Getty Images), Trebek (Ben Hider/Getty Images), Drake (Chris McKay/Getty Images), 
A category on tonight’s “Jeopardy!,” which is in the middle of its collegiate tournament, was called “Let’s Rap Kids!” and featured rap lyrics to some recent hits. That meant that host Alex Trebek was forced to recited the lyrics to Drake’s “Started From The Bottom,” Kanye West’s “Famous,” Lil Wayne’s “6 Foot 7 Foot,” Kendrick Lamar’s “m.A.A.d. City,” and Desiigner’s “Panda. Watch clips from the episode below. At this point, Trebek is no stranger to rapping on the show. He previously rapped Drake’s part of “Jumpman,” from the Future collab What a Time to Be Alive . Last year, “Jeopardy!” referenced Sleater-Kinney , Kanye West , Foo Fighters , Prince, Questlove, A$AP Rocky , Kurt Vile , and the Flaming Lips . There's a rap category on Jeopardy, and Alex Trebek's got BARS. pic.twitter.com/W5NGCBREdf — Justin Ferguson (@JFergusonAU) February 21, 2017 Here's Alex Trebek rapping on @Jeopardy for those of you not watching 😂 pic.twitter.com/FANczhVSl7
